parameters.name: CasId
parameters.description: The certificate ID on Certificate Management Service.

parameters.name: PrivateKey
parameters.description: The private key of the certificate.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The certificate type. Valid values:

*   cas: a certificate purchased by using Certificate Management Service.
*   upload: a custom certificate that you upload.
